mapper.select: select tb_order.order_id, tb_order.order_code, good.goods_id, good.goods_name, good.goods_price, toi.goods_qty, toi.order_item_id from tb_order left join tb_order_item toi on tb_order.order_id = toi.order_id left join tb_goods good on toi.goods_id = good.goods_id

select tb_order.order_id, tb_order.order_code, good.goods_id, good.goods_name, good.goods_price, toi.goods_qty, toi.order_item_id from tb_order left join tb_order_item toi on tb_order.order_id = toi.order_id left join tb_goods good on toi.goods_id = good.goods_id where toi.order_id = #{orderId}

select to2.order_id, to2.order_code, sum(good.goods_price * toi.goods_qty) as money from tb_order as to2 left join tb_order_item toi on to2.order_id = toi.order_id left join tb_goods good on toi.goods_id = good.goods_id group by to2.order_id;
